name: Logic Gates (Camo)
description:
Note: This is still in development so there wont be many features

HOW TO PLAY

- Use the middle mouse to move around

- Scroll to zoom in and out

- Press the numbers (on your keyboard) 1-5 to make new gates

- Drag the gates around to move them

- Right click a gate to delete it

- Drag the output of a gate to an input of another to link them

- Click the output of the 'IN' gate to toggle its state
